actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend rule XXIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to expedite conduct of quorum calls in the Committee of the Whole.

summary.text: Revises rule XXIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that upon the roll call, the procedure of the whole committee rising shall be dispensed with unless a quorum is not present.

titles.title: Resolution to amend rule XXIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to expedite conduct of quorum calls in the Committee of the Whole.
